root.timp_liber_title: Why do you want to have free time:
root.timp_liber_desc: Our mission is to optimize our customers' lives by reducing stress and work with spare time. Helpie is a central point of contact for people who are busy and pressed by time. Because Helpie works for your needs and the desired time, you will only pay a monthly subscription.
root.vezi_lista_servicii: See the full list of services here
root.alatura_te_comunitatii_mobile: JOIN THE SUPER COMMUNITY OF PEOPLE THAT HAVE FREE TIME:
root.alatura_te_comunitatii_desktop:
JOIN THE SUPER COMMUNITY OF
PEOPLE THAT HAVE FREE TIME:
root.comunitate: We at Helpie, understand the importance of your time and therefore our services create spare time for YOU. With high skills and a dedicated staff, we assure you that your needs will be quickly and safely resolved. You can deal with the important things in your life, you streamline tasks with high value for you and your evolution as an individual is faster. With Helpie you can do that in an easy, simple and guaranteed manner!
root.cum_functioneaza_desc:
• Choose the service package that suits you With a wide range of services, Helpie is there for you to create spare time for you. Work with us by means of any method: online, mobile, email, text message.
  • Helpie helps you with your daily tasks. If you have a daily TO DO list, we do solve it. Forward the tasks to us and your spare time will definitely increase. From your Helpie account you request the services, send pictures of the bills, etc.
  • We pay / solve and send the confirmations by phone, email, text message or Helpie account. In your Helpie account, available for desktop and mobile, you can automatically see whenever you want your account balance.
root.alege_fericirea_desc: Start doing what you know best and we will handle the rest!
root.beneficii_desc:
Are you ready to live smart?
  • Saved time
  • Safety
  • Quality of the provided service
  • Get help quickly
  • Fast communication: skype, phone, text message.
  • Fast and secure payments
  • Free consulting for any of the services
root.homepage_testimonial_1_descriere: Alexandru tells how HELPIE helped him to reach 5895 M Kilimanjaro, Aconcagua and Elbrus 6962 M 5642 M
root.homepage_testimonial_2_descriere: Nicoleta is telling us how Helpie changed her life.
root.servicii_desc:
We at Helpie, understand the importance of your time and therefore our services create spare time for YOU. With high skills and a dedicated staff, we assure you that your needs will be quickly and safely resolved.
You can deal with the important things in your life, you streamline tasks with high value for you and your evolution as an individual is faster. With Helpie you can do that in an easy, simple and guaranteed manner!
root.pachete_desc: Our mission is to optimize our customers' lives by reducing stress and work with spare time. Helpie is a central point of contact for people who are busy and pressed by time. Because Helpie works for your needs and the desired time, you will only pay a monthly subscription. Each package includes services for both you and your family
root.corporate_title: Your company shall be organized, efficient and productive
root.corporate_subtitle: Are your employees satisfied with their personal life?
root.corporate_desc:
You can render them a great service and help them save time for rest, relaxation or development.
Create this state of mind for your employee and your company's results will definitely increase. Helpie wants to improve the quality of your employeesâ€™ work.
You give us your contact data and you will receive an email with an offer for your employees.
root.detaliile_taskului: Add photo with the task details(eg. Invoice)
root.echipa_slogan: Our mission is to MAKE free time for YOU
root.blog_desc: Helpie.ro is the platform created for people who wish to have more free time. It is the community of those who choose to do more, to do better in their lives and have more fun.
root.donam_fericire:
PS: We donate happiness!

From the Helpie monthly subscription, there will be automatically transfered 5,8,10 RON to

fundation So.Si.Se.Sa - sosisesa.ro.

.
